title: Oceanic Artathon Round One - Vote Now!

replies.body: hi i am achenar and i want to vote for basically every entry, help me
They all look sooo good, I love Ionia!
how am I supposed to choose these are all amazing!
how many can I vote for or is it only one?

Just the one, unfortunately - which makes it SO HARD D:

Why are you guys all so cool?

Wait, it appears that you can vote as many paintings as you want but can only vote each one once is that correct? Cause on my screen it seems like I vote for so many already and each of them has like a green tick at the bottom corner.

I've just tested, and it looks like you're absolutely correct! I'd misunderstood how it worked - you can only vote for each entry once, but can place multiple votes overall.

Which is how I originally wanted it to work and couldn't figure out...so great! ;) 


**You can vote for multiple entries.**
yay! Now I can vote for so many more artworks {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
love the art, well done everyone to everyone who submitted!
